AI Description: AMD ScaLAPACK (Scalable LAPACK) is a high-performance linear algebra library for distributed-memory computations. It is designed to efficiently solve large-scale problems in numerical linear algebra on parallel distributed memory architectures.
Core Features: High-Performance Linear Algebra Computations, Distributed-Memory Parallel Computing Support, Optimized For Large-Scale Numerical Problems, Provides Routines For Solving Dense Linear Algebra Problems
General Tags: Linear Algebra, Parallel Computing, Distributed Memory, Numerical Computation
